settings_depositGuarantees_subtitle: Set your default guaranteed minimum for estimated deposits
settings_depositGuarantees_text:
Set the guaranteed minimum deposit to be applied whenever a deposit in a transaction can only be estimated.

You can always change the guarantee from this default in each transaction.
settings_linkToConnectorHeader_title: Link your Wallet to a Desktop Browser
settings_linkToConnectorHeader_subtitle: Scan the QR code in the Radix Wallet Connector extension
settings_importFromLegacyWalletHeader_su: Get started importing your Olympia accounts into your new Radix Wallet
